Scatter Plot Interpretation for Temperature and Precipitation

The precipitation data points don't make a straight line along the blue regression line and most of them are present between 24.25-25.25 Â°C (approximately). What does this tell me about the correlation between these two variables? Maybe a low positive correlation? Where AvgTMean = Average annual mean temperature AvgPpt = Average annual precipitation Purpose: I am looking to see correlation between Average annual mean temperature and Average annual precipitation . The plot was generated using the ggstatplot package. Data ( df ): structure(list(year = 1980:2021, AvgTMean = c(24.2700686838937, 23.8852956598276, 25.094446596092, 24.1561175050287, 24.157183605977, 24.3047482638362, 24.7899738481466, 24.5756232655603, 24.5833086228592, 24.7344695534483, 25.3094451071121, 25.2100615173707, 24.3651692293534, 24.5423890611494, 25.2492166633908, 24.7005097837931, 24.2491591827443, 25.0912281781322, 25.0779264303305, 24.403294248319, 24.4983991453592, 24.4292324356466, 24.8179824927011, 24.7243948463075, 24.5086534543966, 24.2818632071983, 24.4567195220259, 24.8402224356034, 24.6574465515086, 24.5440715673563, 23.482670620977, 24.9979594684914, 24.5452453980747, 24.9271462811494, 24.7443215819253, 25.8929839790805, 25.1801908261063, 25.2079308058908, 25.0722425561207, 25.4554644289799, 25.4548979078736, 25.0756772250287), year.1 = 1980:2021, AvgPpt = c(202.704111130864, 114.247733460745, 126.199474853408, 141.152117838805, 116.203497094368, 130.77896716476, 126.350886628546, 107.205512960324, 91.6244152459231, 72.3675977029335, 107.065495697931, 138.900189676504, 114.878379703938, 117.930669633136, 156.362504334285, 149.231959978739, 123.880574706985, 148.447735131721, 135.237081261339, 145.989968136124, 105.967135316339, 120.919120551475, 105.667550237949, 119.329320418424, 94.5035688452337, 134.475944917217, 100.046199758505, 112.607532853243, 117.968374857272, 146.639791754533, 132.227290150763, 117.147468204471, 145.947365902934, 112.396272586057, 125.093465198045, 113.700379223659, 125.374770243706, 163.60349436601, 130.849234933763, 155.373781692023, 224.255287296813, 127.831766140872)), class = "data.frame", row.names = c(NA, -42L )) Code: library(ggstatplot) # Check correlation between AvgTMin and AvgPpt ggscatterstats(data = df, x = AvgTMean, y = AvgPpt) Output:
